bib.title: Multilayer Network Analysis of Polish Parliament 4 Years before and after Smolen{\'n}k Crash
bib.author: Jarynowski, Andrzej and Buda, Andrzej and Piasecki, Maciej
bib.abstract: One of the most significant events in Poland after communism broke up was the emergence of internal conflict after Polish president's plane crash on 10.04. 2010. We investigate relations between political parties in Poland by opinion polls, members transitions between political parties and official speeches in Polish Parliament 4 years before and after Smoleńsk crash. These relations represent medial perception of distances between parties. We observe a topological difference in networks that represent connections between
